laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
laboratory_examinations.findings: The appendix is fluid filled, measuring 11 mm at its greatest width and 7 to 8 mm near its tip with minimal surrounding stranding. Periportal edema is present likely from recent fluid resuscitation. Spleen measures 13.9 cm, at the upper limits of normal. No focal lesions in liver, pancreas, adrenal glands, or kidneys. Moderate to large fecal load in the ascending colon. No free air or free fluid.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In comparison to the prior exam from ___, the dilation of the appendix has slightly increased.
